      if (e.code() != Error::HYPERSPACE_BERKELEYDB_DEADLOCK) { \
        if (e.code() == Error::HYPERSPACE_BERKELEYDB_ERROR) \
          HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END; \
        else \
          HT_WARNF("%s - %s", Error::get_text(e.code()), e.what()); \
        txn->abort(); \
        return __VA_ARGS__; \
      } \
      HT_WARN("Berkeley DB deadlock encountered"); \
